titles.title: A resolution congratulating the Dallas Mavericks on winning the 2011 National Basketball Association Championship.
A resolution congratulating the Dallas Mavericks on winning the 2011 National Basketball Association Championship.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Congratulates the Dallas Mavericks on winning the 2011 National Basketball Association Championship.
